short_summary: The department of national defense is seeking bids for the delivery of helicopter transportation wheel sets.
description: The project aims to deliver helicopter transportation wheel sets to the department of national defense. Deliveries are to be made to 25 CFSD Montreal and are expected to occur no later than 15 April 2024.
full_summary:
# [Bracket Aircraft Handling Wheels](#Bracket-Aircraft-Handling-Wheels)
## Reference Number
- **Reference Number**: cb-955-53406488

## Tender Information
### Solicitation Information
- **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247931
- **Publication Date**: November 30, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

### Bidder Information
- **Amendment Number**: 7
- **Amendment Date**: January 12, 2024

### Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 15, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: April 15, 2024

## Tender Description
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
- **Trade Agreements**: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Regions of Operation
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Canada and United States of America

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Capt Danny Wijoyo
- **Contact Email**: Danny.Wijoyo@forces.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone**: (819) 939-3713

## Tender Documents
- **Tender Documents**: The required documents can be downloaded from [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26308/w8485-247931-brackets-wheeled-aircraft-handlingrfp- \(%28eng-amdt-001.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26308/w8485-247931---6x-brackets-rfp-en\_0.pdf)

## Notes
- The Department of National Defence is seeking proposal for the delivery of aircraft handling wheels to their location in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
- Bidders must provide a Certificate of Conformance from the OEM for any equivalent or substitute product.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Establish clear responsibilities and expectations to all stakeholders regarding document translation. 
- This notice expires after the tender closing date.

I removed the footnote from Reference Number and kept it inside the required markdown marker. I made it more concise
